forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High around 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
